name: DispatchSourceTimer
desc: A dispatch source that submits the event handler block based on a timer.

items.name: func schedule(deadline: DispatchTime, repeating: DispatchTimeInterval, leeway: DispatchTimeInterval)
items.desc: Schedules a timer with the specified deadline, repeat interval, and leeway values.

items.name: func schedule(deadline: DispatchTime, repeating: Double, leeway: DispatchTimeInterval)
items.desc: Schedules a timer with the specified deadline, repeat interval, and leeway values.

items.name: func schedule(wallDeadline: DispatchWallTime, repeating: DispatchTimeInterval, leeway: DispatchTimeInterval)
items.desc: Schedules a timer with the specified time, repeat interval, and leeway values.

items.name: func schedule(wallDeadline: DispatchWallTime, repeating: Double, leeway: DispatchTimeInterval)
items.desc: Schedules a timer with the specified time, repeat interval, and leeway values.
